CREATE DATABASE SalesDB COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8

USE SalesDB

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE csv
WITH (
    LOCATION='https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/csv/'
)

-- Easier to query now
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'customers.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) as customers

-- With Credentials
--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE csv2
--DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL sasToken

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL sasToken
WITH
    IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
    SECRET = 'sp=r&st=2024-02-10T10:02:59Z&se=2024-03-02T18:02:59Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=d&sig=IuFXYZKkEVAu6Jta9wuq%2Fy7iC5WXynm3iODTcUv9zkM%3D&sdd=2';
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE csv2
WITH (
    LOCATION='https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/csv/',
    CREDENTIAL=sasToken
)
GO;

SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'products.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'csv2',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) as products
